title: (x) Infiniti Corp logo - Norma {Nicolai}
content:
Hi,  
I am recreating this logo which is a bit of a mess, but I do not want to stray too much from the original, as the  
client didn’t really want to redesign. Can anyone tell me what font is used in the logo?  
Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014081411im_/http:/typophile.com/files/home-top-right.gif)

 [‹ NOKIA font](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014081411/http:/typophile.com/node/15105 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Chunky Arts House logo - Leviathan {Geoff} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014081411/http:/typophile.com/node/19466 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Headjam

comments.content: That must be [Norma](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014081411/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/norma/) by Franko Luin
